name: express-split-timer
description: An express utility and middleware generator for gathering accurate intra-route metrics

scripts.test-cov-html: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report html -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/

author: Luke Purton
